comments.content: I agree. RSAT is used for regression automated testing.

discussion.content: Second answer should be BPM

BPM is recommended if you want to enable the management and distribution of test libraries across projects and tenants. These capabilities are especially useful for Microsoft partners and independent software vendors (ISVs). BPM enables the distribution of test libraries as part of LCS solutions.

comments.content: RSAT is intended to be used for business cycle tests and scenario tests (multiple component tests) that usually occur at the end of the development lifecycle.

discussion.content:
Should be RSAT:
RSAT lets functional power users record business tasks by using Task recorder and then convert the recordings into a suite of automated tests, without having to write source code.

DRAG DROP -
You are implementing Dynamics 365 Finance.
You need to perform testing.
Which test should you perform? To answer, drag the appropriate test types to the correct requirements. Each test type may be used once, more than once, or not at all. You may need to drag the split bar between panes or scroll to view content.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
Select and Place:
//IMG//

discussion.content:
Ensure that a singular function within the application works with real objects from other classes: Component test.
Ensure that the latency of the application meets the acceptability metrics for users: Performance test.
Ensure that as new capabilities are added, old old capabilities are not broken: Regression test.
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/fin-ops-core/dev-itpro/perf-test/testing-validation
would the first one not be component test since we are using real data?
12 Sep 2022 exam question

questions.question_text:
Note: This question is part of a series of questions that present the same scenario. Each question in the series contains a unique solution that might meet the stated goals. Some question sets might have more than one correct solution, while others might not have a correct solution.
After you answer a question in this section, you will NOT be able to return to it. As a result, these questions will not appear in the review screen.
A company's Dynamics 365 Commerce production instance is updated monthly as new versions of the software are released.
The company needs to identify any potential issues in new releases. They do not have developers to help with this initiative.
You need to implement a way to regression test scenarios.
Solution: Use the Regression Suite Automation Testing (RSAT) framework with Azure DevOps to create regression test scenarios for critical business processes.
Does the solution meet the goal?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
RSAT is intended to be used for business cycle tests and scenario tests (multiple component tests) that usually occur at the end of the development lifecycle. This testing is also referred to as user acceptance testing. 

https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/fin-ops-core/dev-itpro/perf-test/rsat/rsat-overview
Correct
Without developers I am not sure how this is possible.

questions.question_text:
You are a Dynamics 365 Finance system administrator.
Microsoft recently released a new feature for public preview that would add significant value to your organization without licensing adjustments.
You need to enable the feature.
Where can you enable the preview feature?

comments.content: If there's a same version question with different options it means there's more than 1 version on the exam

discussion.content:
In this instance, the answer appears to be the LCS.
However, there is an exact replica of this question further down, but in the options, there is the System Administration, which in turn brings the feature management option into play which would be more accurate.
This is a bit conflicting.

Selected Answer: D
Microsoft Dynamics 365 Lifecycle Services (LCS) is indeed a crucial tool for managing Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations projects1. It provides a cloud-based collaboration portal that customers and their partners can use to manage and assist with Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Finance and Operations projects2. However, LCS is not typically where you would enable preview features.

Preview features for Dynamics 365 Finance are usually enabled in the Power Platform admin center1. This is where you can manage environments, select settings, and turn on or off specific features1. Therefore, the correct answer to your question is D. experience.dynamics.com, not B. Lifecycle Services.

Selected Answer: B
Previews are made available as a deployable package via the Shared Asset Library in Lifecycle Services. 
Early access to the upcoming service update is available to all customers by taking advantage of its preview. The preview service update is used to validate customizations, learn about new features, and provide feedback to Microsoft. During this phase, the service update must be deployed on a Dev/Test environment. This release cannot be used in production. Once released, the package can be downloaded from the Shared Asset Library in LCS. You agree to the program terms at install time. Sign up for access to preview (formerly known as the Preview Early Access Program (PEAP)) is no longer required.
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/fin-ops-core/fin-ops/get-started/public-preview-releases

Selected Answer: B
Preview feature management within Lifecycle Services (LCS) explains that Public previews are enabled by default therefore you should not need to enable the preview feature there. The correct answer should be Feature management but this is not an option.

enable pre-view is in LCS
enable new feature is in Product box.
The question should be "enable preview" instead of "enable feature". hard to pick. B or c
If it's preview, you need to deploy that quality update from LCS. If it's not preview than will go to prod. env. in next package(as a std) LCS is the correct Answer.
LCS is the correct answer.
Public previews are made available as a deployable package via the Shared Asset Library in Lifecycle Services. So, more correct answer is B.
LCS is correct to prview a feature.

They need to give more info in this question. Some items need to be enabled in Feature management and some will require doing an install Add In in LCS. I suppose since Sys Admin is not available then it can only be LCS for this question.
